description: Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) is seeking a vendor that provides a SaaS-based integrated web analytics/web governance solution to provide the Indigenous Services Canada’s Communications and Public Affairs Sector with a centralized way to track and monitor content uptake and quality for the Indigenous Services Canada (ISC), Crown-Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs Canada (CIRNAC) and Nutrition North Canada’s (NNC) public-facing internet websites.",
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: Cloud-Based Web Analytics and Governance Solution

## Description

Indigenous Services Canada (ISC), in partnership with Crown-Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs Canada (CIRNAC) and Nutrition North Canada (NNC), is seeking a client provider of a cloud-based, integrated web analytics and governance solution to track and monitor the performance of their publicly-facing websites. This solution will provide a centralized tool to analyze and measure content uptake and quality.

## Tender Information

* Reference Number: PW-23-01024558
* Solicitation Number: 1000248152
* Tender Title (English): Software-as-a--Service (SaaS), cloud-based, integrated web analytics/web governance solution
* Tender Title (French): Solution informatique de gouvernance et d'analytique Web intégrée pour un logiciel-service
* Tender Status: Expired
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-02-16T14:00:00
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Canada

## Contracting Entity

* Contracting Entity Name: Indigenous Services Canada
* Contracting Entity Address: 10 Wellington St., Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0H4

## Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation will be based on the proposal and the vendor's ability to meet the requirements outlined in the tender documents.

## Submission Requirements

Submissions must be in accordance with the terms and conditions outlined in the tender documents.

## Contact Information

* Contact Name: Alma Moyeda
* Contact Email: alma.moyeda@sac-isc.gc.ca
* Contact Phone: 819-271-6488

## Documents

The following documents are available for download:

* Tender Documents (English) <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/02/4aa1856cc48abeb414bc5bab151e3d5a/1000248152_rfp_english.pdf>
* Tender Documents (French) <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/02/d3240d6c1f425ad09f145cead08232fd/1000248152_rfp_french.pdf>

Note that the tender has expired, and it was discounted from the rewrite.
